text:
Alia Bhatt Stuns In Her Bridal Avatar As Pictures & Videos Of Her Dance From Kalank Sets Go Viral
Alia Bhatt Stuns In Her Bridal Avatar As Pictures & Videos Of Her Dance From Kalank Sets Go Viral
Dharma Productions multi-starrer period Drama Kalank is in the news for all the right reasons. Apart from being one of Dharma's most crucial upcoming projects, the film stars actors like Varun Dhawan, Madhuri Dixit, Sanjay Dutt, Aditya Roy Kapur, Sonakshi Sinha, and Alia Bhatt, making it one of the most awaited films.
While Alia Bhatt and Varun Dhawan keep updating their fans through their social media posts about the film, a few pics from the sets from Gwalior managed to pave the way on the internet.
A few pictures and videos of Alia Bhatt and Madhuri Dixit in bridal attire have gone viral on the internet.
In one of the viral clips, Alia Bhatt can be seen shooting for a dance sequence. Have a look at the pictures and videos that will make you all excited for the film.
Don't Miss 336 SHARES 247 SHARES 699 SHARES 12.5 K SHARES 5.5 K SHARES
